title: Bug 7581: ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in property sheet
OB: The ComboBoxCellEditor in the property sheet does not size correctly.
EB: I would expect that the combo box is always the same width as the property sheet column. Note that this behavior should be the same as the DialogCellEditor, where the button is always visible. We need to investigate if this issue is caused by our code or by SWT.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the property sheet.
2. Edit a field that uses the ComboBoxCellEditor.
3. Observe that the width of the combo box does not match the width of the property sheet column.
